term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - large particle in radiation scattering
term.title: large particle

item.text: A particle with dimensions comparable with the wavelength of the radiation in the medium or larger. In practice a particle must be treated as large if its largest dimension exceeds about one-twentieth of the wavelength employed.
